name: Expanding Planet
description:
Game created in 2 hours as practice for Ludum Dare 32 and to give my students a max standard to aim for in their final exam. Everything with the exception of this info page was done within the two hour limit.

Theme: Expanding World

Resources Used:

Planet from Justin Nichol

URL: http://opengameart.org/content/20-planet-sprites

Bullets from Master484

URL: http://opengameart.org/content/bullet-collection-2-m484-games

Spaceship from Redshrike

URL: http://opengameart.org/content/space-ship-building-bits-volume-1

All code and logic writen by Languard Gemstrike (that's me)

Gameplay:

Use the mouse to aim the ship and W to move forward. Holding down the mouse button fires your guns. As the planet expands it will start to shoot faster. Don't get hit.

Eh? Why does the planet expand when you shoot it? Er....

'Cause Video Games!
